author: AngelCalvo
body:
- [ ] Resolves issue #abcd.
- [ ] Code is [rebased](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/git/README.md#sync-your-local-repo) on `origin/master`.
- [ ] Add tests that fail without your changes.
- [ ] Update all relevant [documentation](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/tree/master/docs).

added the wording "require" too.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body:
Merge conflicts need to be resolved
Please resolve all merge conflicts.  For more information see [GitHowTo - 30. Resolving Conflicts](http://githowto.com/resolving_conflicts)

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body: I'll take care of getting these minor tweaks in with my next PR.

title: Update testing-guidelines.md
